instruction: Write a description of a cloudless summer sky.
output: A cloudless summer sky is a beautiful sight to behold. The endless sea of vibrant blue stretches out in all directions and is speckled with a few tufts of white cotton candy clouds. The sun is high in the sky, beaming down its golden rays which seem to dance with the whistle of the breeze. The vastness of the big sky paints an awe inspiring scene that intrigues the imagination.

instruction: Name five popular movies from the 1990s.
output: Popular movies from the 1990s include The Lion King, Forrest Gump, Titanic, Home Alone, and The Sixth Sense.

instruction: Generate a step-by-step guide for baking a cake.
output:
Step 1: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
Step 2: Grease a 9-by-13-inch baking pan with butter.
Step 3: In a large bowl, combine 1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Stir thoroughly with a whisk or a fork.
Step 4: In a separate bowl, combine 1/2 cup (1 stick) of butter, one cup of sugar, two eggs, and one teaspoon of vanilla extract. Beat together with an electric mixer until light and creamy.
Step 5: Slowly add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and beat until everything is combined.
Step 6: Pour the batter into the prepared pan and spread it evenly.
Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean.
Step 8: Let the cake cool for 15 minutes before serving. Enjoy!

instruction: Name three sciences related to computing.
output: Three sciences related to computing are computer science, information science, and software engineering.

instruction: Name five types of computer programming languages.
output: Five types of computer programming languages are C, C++, Java, JavaScript, and Python.

instruction: From the given sentence, generate a plausible analogy.
input: Learning is like planting a seed.
output: Just like planting a seed requires care, patience, and adequate conditions in order to ensure that it grows into a healthy plant, learning requires a conducive environment, perseverance, and guidance to ensure successful acquisition of knowledge.

instruction: Sort the given words according to length.
output: stream, lake, river, ocean

instruction: Combine three sets of figures to make a meaningful phrase.
output: August 10th, 2015

instruction: Identify the faulty/incorrect part of the sentence.
input: The police are warning drivers to "avoid being careless and wearing seatbelts during a drive".
output: "Avoid being careless and wearing seatbelts during a drive" shouldn't have quotation marks.

instruction: Compile a list of events for a birthday party
input: It is an outdoor birthday party for an 8-year old boy in the afternoon.
output:
- Make decorations with colorful balloons
- Serve cake and ice-cream to the guests
- Set up a bounce house or inflatable water slide 
- Play outdoor birthday games like "pin the tail on the donkey" or a water balloon toss
- Have karaoke or rent a dance floor to enjoy music
- Set up a craft table with arts and crafts activities
- Plan a scavenger hunt
- Rent a popcorn or cotton candy machine
- Have face painting or a magician
- Make a special birthday video with pictures and wishes

instruction: Compile a shopping list for the summer picnic.
input: Family is having a summer picnic at the park for 10 people.
output:
- Plates, cups and utensils
- Paper towels, napkins and wet wipes
- Drinks such as soft drinks, juice, and water 
- Sandwiches, salads and other picnic food 
- Various snacks, such as chips and popcorn
- Ice for coolers 
- Condiments such as salsa, mustard and ketchup
- Buns and bread
- Checks and blankets 
- Sunscreen
- Insect repellent
- Games such as badminton, frisbee and board games

instruction: Construct a paragraph that motivates someone to start exercising.
output: Exercising is a great way to stay fit and healthy. Not only does it help improve your physical health, but it can also help to reduce stress and improve your mental health. Regular exercise can help you reach your fitness goals and maintain a healthy lifestyle. It can also improve your energy levels and help you sleep better. Even if you don't think you have enough time in your day, you can easily fit a few minutes of exercise into your day to get the benefits. So, don't wait any longer! Take charge of your health and start exercising today.

instruction: Categorize the list into three categories.
output:
Category 1: Carrots, spinach
Category 2: Oranges, apples
Category 3: None.

instruction: Give an example of something that is both a fruit and a vegetable.
output: Tomato is both a fruit and a vegetable.

instruction: Predict what will happen next in the given story.
input: John was walking home from school when he saw a glittering diamond on the ground.
output: John will pick up the diamond and bring it home. He will show it to his family and they will be amazed by the discovery. He might try to trace the owners of the diamond to return it to them or he might keep it as a souvenir of his lucky find.

instruction: Design a cinema poster for the movie "The Matrix"
output: A poster featuring the silhouette of Neo with Morpheus over his shoulder and the green tint of the Matrix behind engulfed in the red glow of the text "Welcome to the Matrix". #TheMatrix #MoviePoster #CinemaPoster

instruction: Compose a message to confirm a meeting
input:
Subject: Meeting with the Supplier 
Date and Time: Saturday, June 5 at 10 A.M.
Location: Zoom Meeting
output:

See you then!
